section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: In number 76-1572, United States against Grayson for reasons stated in an opinion filed with the clerk this morning, the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit is reversed and the case is remanded to that court for reinstatement of the sentence of the District Court.
Mr. Justice Stewart with whom Mr. Justice Brennan and Mr. Justice Marshall joined filed a dissenting opinion.
